channel.title: Server Source
channel.description:
I am REALLY looking to make a good server.. I have posted this awhile back but didn't get any replies sooo...
I need a good source for my server.. I have about 60$ to spend on the server and I think that is enough. I'm debating whether to use a dspk or not.. I really want a good, stable source that will stay online. I just need some suggestions because I do not know what to use.. Thanks :p

item.title: Server Source
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:26, topic:409032”]If most people thought that the world was flat, would you also believe that? Even if you knew better?

If most people thought that the Earth was the center of the solar system, would you believe that? Even if you knew better?

My point is, just because the majority of people do something / believe something, doesn’t mean you should do it / believe it. And Java is Java. I don’t really see the complexity in it. Hyperion is just a new set-up and you just need time to learn how to use it.[/quote]

The thing about Hyperion is I have no idea how to code skills/minigames and all that… I barely know the basics of Java… I could learn it but I don’t know how to code those things or even where to look to code them.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Source
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

If most people thought that the world was flat, would you also believe that? Even if you knew better?

If most people thought that the Earth was the center of the solar system, would you believe that? Even if you knew better?

My point is, just because the majority of people do something / believe something, doesn’t mean you should do it / believe it. And Java is Java. I don’t really see the complexity in it. Hyperion is just a new set-up and you just need time to learn how to use it.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Source
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

The Wanderer:

Models, interfaces, and all the like is all client sided. What you do with these models and such is server sided. So say you want a stable server with a 317 client loading 630, then you just open up hyperion, run it, and then run your client loading that newer cache. The only thing that might change is player rendering, and I’m not 100% sure on that.

I think I understand… But Hyperion is confusing to me… I’ve been working with PI around a year now so… I don’t really know. It seems like most servers are PI.

Read full topic

The only thing that might change is player rendering, and I’m not 100% sure on that.

item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

The Wanderer:

That’s all client sided. You are asking for a server source.

item.title: Server Source
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:20, topic:409032”][quote author=Mr.czar link=topic=510315.msg3703193#msg3703193 date=1312868713]

if u want PI
use hybrid pvp or torvapkz

This is what I kept getting last time… You do not understand how unstable those are.

Exactly how are these unstable? I use hybrid base, and I host 24/7 no lagg, never shutsdown… had over 40 online with no lagg still. Torva pkz and Hybrid are your best bet for a good source.
[/quote]
Lol. You think 40 is a lot of players? Try loading 200 on your server. I bet your server will crash before that. PI is extremely unstable.

@OP If you want a 317 then use RuneSource. It is starting to get highly developed and some tutorials, so you won’t be at a total loss. Also there is Hyperion. A great base to say the least. You can have 2000 players on Hyperion easily.[/quote]

But the thing is… I realize Hyperion is REALLY stable but players like things like dspk… Even though it is REALLY bad they like things like that… they like shitty delta’s with customs they don’t like Hyperion with no customs oldschool pk… I like that but most a lot of the people that play RSPS’s are retards and don’t know what is good and what isn’t… That’s why I don’t know what to use… plus I doubt my server will get 2000 players

Read full topic

item.title: Server Source
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“Mr.czar, post:17, topic:409032”][quote author=Vexillum link=topic=510315.msg3702962#msg3702962 date=1312854261]

if u want PI
use hybrid pvp or torvapkz

This is what I kept getting last time… You do not understand how unstable those are.
[/quote]

Exactly how are these unstable? I use hybrid base, and I host 24/7 no lagg, never shutsdown… had over 40 online with no lagg still. Torva pkz and Hybrid are your best bet for a good source.[/quote]
Lol. You think 40 is a lot of players? Try loading 200 on your server. I bet your server will crash before that. PI is extremely unstable.

@OP If you want a 317 then use RuneSource. It is starting to get highly developed and some tutorials, so you won’t be at a total loss. Also there is Hyperion. A great base to say the least. You can have 2000 players on Hyperion easily.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Source
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

[quote=“Thanks, post:18, topic:409032”]It mainly depends on what your looking for in a server.

What do you prefer 562+ graphics or 317?

Are you planning on leeching a server or are you actually going to code…(please actually code)

I personally like Delta for 317’s(this is an opinion lol…) But I find it much easier to find things and code.
PI isn’t hard or anything but I dislike how its setup(yet it looks like a 562 and that is exactly what I am working on now.)[/quote]

Trust me I won’t leech… I’m not going to post here for help anymore because I ask for a PI source and I said PLEASE don’t say use a dspk and people recommend delta servers and dspks soo…

Read full topic

item.title: Server Source
item.dc:creator: @Thanks Thanks
item.description:
@Thanks wrote:

It mainly depends on what your looking for in a server.

What do you prefer 562+ graphics or 317?

Are you planning on leeching a server or are you actually going to code…(please actually code)

I personally like Delta for 317’s(this is an opinion lol…) But I find it much easier to find things and code.
PI isn’t hard or anything but I dislike how its setup(yet it looks like a 562 and that is exactly what I am working on now.)

Read full topic

I need a good source for my server… I have about 60$ to spend on the server and I think that is enough. I’m debating whether to use a dspk or not… I really want a good, [size=72pt]stable[/size] source that will stay online. I just need some suggestions because I do not know what to use… Thanks :p[/quote]
